testcase.brief: (IxPort: C=0)Verify the different BASE-T ports are aggregated into one port channel;
testcase.description: Verify the different BASE-T ports are aggregated into one port channel;

step.desc: Show interface mgt0 to get ip address
mode:copper,set 4 ports to different configuration, auto/1000/100/10
step.ssh: -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} speed auto' -v 'interface ${sw1.port2} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port2} speed 1000' -v 'interface ${sw1.port3} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port3} speed 100' -v 'interface ${sw1.port4} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port4} speed 10'

step.desc: mode:copper,show run to confirm; member interfaces are different from the others before add them to agg
mode:copper,show interface to confirm; member interfaces are different from the others before add them to agg
mode:copper,set agg 1 100/full/enable and configure 4 interfaces to the agg
step.ssh: -v 'agg ${agg_id}' -v 'interface agg${agg_id} shutdown' -v 'interface agg${agg_id} speed ${agg_speed}' -v 'interface agg${agg_id} flow-control enable' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} agg ${agg_id}' -v 'interface ${sw1.port2} agg ${agg_id}' -v 'interface ${sw1.port3} agg ${agg_id}' -v 'interface ${sw1.port4} agg ${agg_id}'

step.desc: mode:copper,show run to confirm; member interfaces are the same as agg(cover the config itself)
mode:copper,show inter to confirm(speed/duplex/flowcotrol); member interfaces are the same as agg
mode:copper,reconfigure port1; should show error info
mode:copper,no agg 1, show run to confirm; member interfaces are the same as agg(cover the config itself)
mode:copper, no agg 1, show inter to confirm(speed/duplex/flowcotrol); member interfaces are the same as agg
